channel.title: Algebra Problem on Mr. Eric
channel.description: Recent content in Algebra Problem on Mr. Eric
channel.copyright:
Welcome to study, discuss, even debate together.
No plagiarism please, because simply copying, even only one word, even only one minute, will waste time in our life. While copying, you use other’s opinions, but yourself don’t have one.

This work is licensed under theCreative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International (CC BY-NC-SA 4.0) License Agreement.

item.title: Algebra Problem No.9
item.description: Complete each problem below by hand. Show your work and provide a reason for each step. Calculators are not allowed on this assignment.
